Description:
UNDER OFFER/ UNDER CONTRACT
SELANDRA RISE: If you have been searching for the perfect property to upgrade/downsize into or rent out without having to endure a lengthy building process then I suggest you inspect this fine opportunity.
Designed and constructed by award winning builder Porter Davis "The Chelsea III" offers a free flowing floor plan sure to be appreciated by all. Positioned on a low maintenance allotment measuring 336m2 the property measures some 16.31 squares under roofline and is comprised of 3 spacious robed bedrooms (master with FES and WIR) plus a central hostess kitchen complete with island bench, Caesar stone bench tops, stainless steel dishwasher, 900mm cook top, range hood plus ample cupboard/bench space. All this and a whole lot more overlooking the open meals area and spacious family room.
Added bonuses include a porched entry, 2590mm high ceilings, smart wiring, recycled water, solar hot water, flyscreens to all opening windows, ducted heating, evaporative cooling and a rear concreted area.
Outside your will be greeted by a modern facade, beautifully designed landscaping, a remote SLUG plus a roomy, care free back yard with colour bond fencing and plenty of room to construct a pergola zone (S.T.C.A.).
Created by well known developers Stockland, Selandra Rise is designed around open outdoor areas creating an innovative, greener lifestyle. A uniquely planned community this terrific estate will cater to your every need. The grand plan features a town centre with supermarket, retail and community centres, health and childcare services, Primary and Secondary schools with local employment and aged care facilities within an easy walk. You will have no trouble in creating the perfect work-life balance with the extensive parkland, multiple playgrounds catering for all children's ages, interconnected walking/bike tracks and sporting grounds!
Within a short drive to freeway access and all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne this property is only minutes away from the popular Clyde Primary School plus the newly constructed Casey Fields football ground and aquatic centre.
If you want your family to have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation call today before it's GOING, GOING ..... GONE!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW! - *PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS*!

Description:
Construction Started - Brilliant New 4 Bedroom Family Home
This brand new 4 bedroom home is located in a sought after location on a level block of land in the popular Meridian Estate. This new design features a formal entry, spacious open plan living areas including a separate lounge, magnificent kitchen with 900mm stainless steel appliances and a large walk in pantry. Outside the sliding door you will find an alfresco area perfect for outdoor entertaining. All of the bedrooms have built in robes, whilst the master has an ensuite and a walk in robe. Complete with a double garage with remote and direct entry into the home, gas heating, all floor coverings, fences, drive, basic landscaping, blinds throughout, TV antenna, clothesline, fly wire screens and more. Just move in and enjoy.

Description:
Great family home
Rarely does a unique family home present itself in such a desired location! Free standing & completely individual, this better than new luxury residence offers all the modern conveniences at an exceptional level & is located in the most popular
"Selandra Rise Estate"
Bedroom & Living Areas
- 4 bedroom, 2 bathrooms incl. master bed with ensuite
- Large theatre room with double doors
- Formal lounge at entrance
- Big family area central to kitchen and alfresco
- Large alfresco with extended decking
Kitchen:
- 900mm s/steel appliances & Dishwasher
- Large Caesarstone benchtops & Glass splash back
Other important features:
- 9 foot Ceiling & 16 Solar Panels
- Ducted vacuum
- Evaporate cooling & ducted heating
- LED downlights throughout
- Porcelain tiles in main areas & timber flooring in bedrooms
- Double garage with remote control and internal access
- Fully landscaped and low maintenance gardens
Walk to:
- Wilandra Rise primary School
- St. Peters College
- Selandra Rise & Clyde Shopping Centre
- Eclipse Learning Centre
- Selandra Rise Community Place
- Bus Stop
This exclusive 29 squares. (approx.) home is the remarkable versatile property that suits many buyers and sure to impress, enquire now with Naval on 0401 489 262.

Description:
Double Garage Completes This Perfect Package
Modern and refreshing, situated on a low maintenance block with stunning street appeal and double garage set in the backyard, this loving three bedroom home is perfect for first home buyers, retirees or a rock solid investment opportunity.
Offering a free functional floor plan with stunning tiles flowing through to the light-filled meals/kitchen complete with quality stainless steel appliances, stunning range hood and large island bench, overlooking the spacious living area and low maintenance backyard ideal for entertaining family and friends.
Sink your feet into the plush carpet in the beautiful master bedroom complete with his-and-hers built in robes and full ensuite, another 2 well-sized robed bedrooms and a stylish central bathroom with a separate toilet.
Oozing with warmth and love, make this family home yours before somebody else does.
Further extras include:
-Ducted heating
-Air conditioning
-Quality fixtures and fittings throughout
-600mm Gas Cooktop and Oven
-20mm stone bench top in the kitchen
-Solar Hot Water System
-Security Door
-Remote Controlled Double Garage
-Downlights throughout
Selandra Rise is designed around open outdoor areas creating an innovative, greener lifestyle. A uniquely planned community, this terrific estate will cater to your every need. The grand plan features a town centre with supermarket, retail and community centres, health and childcare services, with local employment and aged care facilities close by. You will have no trouble in creating the perfect work-life balance with the multiple playgrounds catering for all children's ages, interconnected walking/bike tracks and sporting grounds!
Within a short drive to freeway access and all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne this property is also only minutes away from the popular Wilandra Rise Primary School and Clyde Primary School, the Casey Fields football ground and the aquatic centre.
For more information or to arrange an inspection, please contact Samra Zizak 0481 877 444.

Description:
Stylish family living
Set amongst quality homes in the ever-sought-after Selandra Rise Estate, this simply gorgeous family home is the one you have been waiting for. The dynamic floor plan and modern conveniences harmoniously combine to create a desirable lifestyle with plenty of space for all.
- The hub of the home is the stunning open plan kitchen and living zone with feature raised ceilings, leading through to the second living
- Boasting 2 undercover alfrescos to entertain to your heart's content
- Low maintenance landscaped gardens to front and rear
Further complementing the home is the fantastic location being within walking distance to Selandra Rise Shopping Centre, and close proximity to Primary & Secondary Schools, multiple shopping precincts, public transport and easy access to major road arterials including the Monash Freeway. Call us today to arrange an inspection before the opportunity passes

Description:
Why Build? Move into this in December 2019 instead!
Exemplary in design with sleek elements of modernity, this 4-bedroom premium family residence has been brilliantly constructed with no expenses spared. A striking modern facade with attractive low maintenance landscaped gardens and double car garage create a lasting impression, even before entry. Inside you are greeted with an instant sense of warmth as fresh neutral tones and floor to ceiling windows dressed by wooden plantation shutters allow natural light to flood in. A crisp, contemporary kitchen with walk-in butler’s pantry and flush white cabinetry is the heart of this exemplary home, overlooking an expansive lounge space with custom-built cabinets and a separate sanction to dine – the ultimate quarter for entertaining guests and enjoying life with family. An impressive luxury master suite to the front, boasting fitted dressing room and hotel-inspired ensuite – floor to ceiling tiles, marble-lined benches, frameless shower and premium Bocchi feature vanities. 3 well-sized bedrooms with built in robes are serviced by a trendy bathroom with freestanding bath – the Bocchi pedestal vanity is a feature on its own! The family is well catered for with the separate rumpus – ability to shut it off with wooden concertina doors, it leads out to the alfresco allowing for an abundance of year-round family fun. A stylish and endless list of unexpected extras includes Braemar refrigerated heating/cooling system, built-in surround sound, SMEG kitchen appliances, SOS home hub system and dazzling pendant and LED lighting throughout. This stylish lifestyle in the convenient Clydevale Estate is close to schools, public transport, parks, popular sporting facilities and Freeway access awaits. With a 7 % leaseback until May 2019 (negotiable), this provides an exciting investment opportunity or rather than buy land, wait for it to title and then build, the time will be ready for you to move in to this one!

Description:
LAND IN CLYDEVALE ESTATE - 560 SQM
CLYDE NORTH: Looking for the great location to build your dream home? There is plenty of scope to design and build your ideal floor plan either to move into or rent out.
Located just 45 minutes southeast of Melbourne and just 10 minutes from Berwick, Clydevale is centrally located to plenty of amenities that any family would need. There is 9 hectares of open land/parkland for kids to run and play, bbq areas, running tracks and basketball courts, close to plenty of established amenities, including a host of excellent schools and tertiary education options.
* Selandra Rise Shopping Centre is approximately 1.5km away
* St Peters Secondary College is approximately 2km away
* St Thomas Apostle Primary School is approximately 2.5km
* Berwick Chase Primary School approximately 6km away
* Casey Hospital is approximately 9km away
* Berwick Train Station is approximately 8.5km away
* Bus Route #798 is approximately 1.5km away
* Casey Fields is approximately 4km away
* Future Town Centre within walking distance away
Our images and photos are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy of the sizes mentioned. Please contact your solicitor to get the section 32 checked.

Own your first home or Investment in the Heart of Clyde North

Description:
Affinity—Affordable Luxury
Situated in the sought after Circa Estate, proudly presenting this Sorrento Deluxe 47 square Carlisle home from the Affinity collection. Live in the lap of luxury with this sophisticated design, showcasing the finest architectural detail, meticulously designed for seamless and light-filled open-plan living. Sitting on a substantial 572sqm (approx.) elevated allotment, surrounded by quality public and private schools, enjoying the convenience of easy access to shopping centres, hospitals, train stations and Monash freeway, whether you are looking for your first dream home or growing family looking to upgrade, this is the one for you. Upon entry, sparkling timber flooring throughout the hallway leads you from the study through to the stunning formal lounge to a communal dining and family area. An undercover outdoor entertainment area is perfect for the entertainers. The grand designed kitchen offers an oversized stone island bench with breakfast bar, glass splashback and full butlers pantry. 5 spacious bedrooms and rumpus room are all upstairs – 2 of the secondary bedrooms with full ensuites and WIR’s. A grand hotel-like master retreat with the luxury of a private sitting area, elaborate walk-in robe, and deluxe twin vanity ensuite with spa, accessed via your own hallway – enjoy the sunset from the Juliet balcony. The main bathroom is modern and is serviced by the remaining 2 bedrooms. Extra features include 5-star ducted heating and evap cooling, CCTV and alarm system, upgraded higher rating insulation, two way switches and extra power points. A low maintenance backyard is ready to enjoy. The list of added extras will be revealed upon an inspection. Such a good quality built premium property, inspection is a MUST.

Description:
Palatial elegence
Nestled in this quiet and highly sort after location this home has everything your family needs and is so close to the best amenities and elite schools.
This Display Comes With:
- Stunning facade with feature render & weatherboard to front room with aluminium window, feature bricks to garage with remote panel lift door, feature front door entry.
- All floor coverings including timber look flooring throughout, carpet to bedrooms and lounge floor tiles to wet areas.
- Window coverings.
- Security alarm system.
- Ducted heating and evaporative cooling.
- Front and rear Landscaping including Driveway.
- Grand master bedroom to the rear, with large walk in robe, double vanities, shower and separate toilet to ensuite.
- Gourmet kitchen with quantum quartz stone, 900 Westinghouse free standing oven, walk in pantry with plenty of storage and dishwasher.
- Internal access from garage.
- Undercover rear alfresco with decking.
This home will be available to move into May 2018.
Don't miss your opportunity to secure this beautiful home for you and your family!

Description:
Love Living In Prestigious Circa
Situated in the exceedingly popular Clyde North's "Circa", is this wonderful family home, boasting functional floorplan and high quality fittings and fixtures. The heart of the home is the north facing open living spaces at the rear downstairs, overlooked by gourmet kitchen with stone benchtops, 900mm oven, as well as butler's pantry.
Conveniently located downstairs the master suite includes WIR x 2, as well as sizeable ensuite, with twin basin, stone vanity, floor to ceiling tiles, and freestanding tub.
Completing the first level discover superb theatre room, and sophisticated powder room.
The second level boasts four generous bedrooms all with WIRs, serviced by main bathroom again with twin basins, whilst also offering sizeable rumpus with commanding views.
Alfresco accessed by way of bi-fold doors, in-ground pool and spacious grassed area ensures an opportunity to create a wonderful atmosphere for entertaining.
Creature comforts include; ducted heating, floating floor throughout, internal access from DLUG. Close proximity to Eden Rise shops, esteemed schools, public transport and all amenities.
Enquire today, this one will not last!

Description:
Everything You Want in Delaray Estate !
This immaculate family home is only 8 months old.Modern design, it is sure to impress the fussiest of buyers and investors alike.
It was important to the owners when they built this home that it was in the best location and had all the upgrades possible. Approximately $25k of upgrades in total ensure the kitchen, bathroom, lighting, heating, cooling, alfresco and driveway are all top quality. Best of all, this home was built by one of the best builders around - Dennis Family Homes.
Features include:
• 4 king size bedrooms with an optional 5th in the kids retreat
• Master with walk-in robes and full ensuite located at the front of the home
• Bedrooms 2 & 3 include built-in robes with shared king size bathroom with bath and separate toilet
• 3 large open plan living rooms, kitchen, meals, TV/family room and kids games room with sliding door, also ideal for a cinema room or 5th bedroom
• Luxury kitchen with stone bench-tops, quality stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, premium 900mm gas cook-top with electric oven and breakfast bar
• walk-in pantry with fridge cavity
• Ducted heating and cooling
• Study nook
• 2 car garage with remote control and access to inside
• Exposed aggregate driveway
• Smart neutral tiles in dining and wet zones
• Soft modern carpet in living and bedrooms
• Large outdoor alfresco entertaining area
• 2 off street car parks ideal for the growing family
• Smart low-maintenance landscaping
• Stone benchtops on all bathroom vanities
• Quality tiles and carpet throughout
Location is one of the biggest boasts of this address. Set in the master planned resort-style Delaray Estate, a fully equipped gym, swimming pools, tennis and basketball courts and café will shortly be right at your doorstep. Stunning wetlands and beautifully landscaped parks ensure there really is no place like home. Yet convenient appointment in Clyde North means established shopping, schooling, medical and public transport amenities are right at hand.
This home is up for Private sale Photo ID is required upon inspection

Description:
Perfect for Investors, Families and Couples
This fantastic 3 bedroom home located off Grices Road is perfect for investors, families and couples looking for a home that has it all.
Features include;
- 3 spacious bedrooms
- 1 bathroom and 1 ensuite
- Floating Floors
- Top of the Range Kitchen
- Covered Entertainment Area
- Cooling & Heating
- Low Maintenance Backyard
- Open Plan Living
The home is surrounded by parks and playgrounds and is close to Hillcrest Christian College and Rivercrest Christian College. It is also within 5-10 minute driving distance to Eden Rise Shopping Centre, Casey Hospital and Princes Fwy, what more could you want! Contact us now on 5991 1800 or 0417 056 941 to arrange an inspection time.

Description:
Entertainers delight in Berwick waters
Easy on the eye, this amazing Porter Davis home set in the much sought-after Berwick Waters Estate.
This inviting single level home offers the perfect indoor/outdoor lifestyle balance, with light filled open plan living areas all spilling to a choice of either a decked Alfresco or Courtyard setting.
The huge well-appointed kitchen is a Chef’s delight with expansive 40mm stone benchtops, quality s/steel Blanco appliances, glass splashbacks, butler’s pantry and a plethora of soft close cabinetry, and is the central hub of this home, whilst overlooking the dining and family room.
- Oversized Master bedroom with full en-suite and walk in robe.
remaining bedrooms all have built in robes.
- Chefs kitchen with s/steel European appliances and butler’s pantry
with walk through to spacious laundry.
- Remote dlug with internal access.
- Low maintenance manicured gardens with a feature wall and large stone planters.
Extra comforts include: CCTV, Local Alarm, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, quality light fittings and window furnishings, carpets to all bedrooms, formal living areas and attractive detailed doors and skirting boards, the list goes on.
Lovingly maintained with absolutely nothing to do but move in. This rare gem is ready and waiting for you.
Call for your private viewing today to avoid disappointment.

Description:
SOLD BY CHAMINDA GUNASEKARA
CLYDE NORTH: If you are looking for an outstanding location to build your dream home then there is plenty of scope to design and build your ideal floor plan on this titled 392 SQM (approximately) sized parcel of land.
Nestled in this prestigious community of Berwick Waters and located just 45 minutes southeast of Melbourne there is so much on offer that would meet any family lifestyle. Close to plenty of established amenities these inclusions comprise of open land/parkland for kids to run and play, BBQ areas, running tracks and basketball courts. Also on offer is the Eden Rise Shopping Centre and a host of excellent schools and tertiary education options.
Combine all these outstanding features and with the Berwick train station only moments away, it's no surprise why Clyde North has become one of Melbourne's fastest growing suburbs.
Invest in your future here!
- Eden Rise Shopping Centre is approximately 5 minutes' drive from the property
- Berwick Train Station is approximately 10 minutes' drive from the property
- Parklands and recreational facilities approximately 5 minutes' walk from the property
- St Catherine's Catholic Primary School is approximately 0.61 km away from the property
- Berwick Chase Primary School is approximately 1.27 km away from the property
- Alkira Secondary College is approximately 2.62 km away from the property
- Kambrya College is approximately 2.64 km away from the property
- Brentwood Park Primary School is approximately 2.76 km away from the property
- Hillcrest Christian College is approximately 2.89 km away from the property
- Heritage College is approximately 3.61 km away from the property
- St Francis Xavier College is approximately 4.05 km away from the property
- Close to public transport and a short 5 minute drive to the Monash Freeway
(Our images and photos are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy of the sizes mentioned. Please contact your solicitor to get the section 32 checked.)

Description:
Massive land block, Ideal location!
Clyde Vale Estate: If you are looking for a good sized land block to build the house of your dreams, you need to look no further!
This massive Titled Land block 512sqm (16 X 32) is located in the most spectacular and sought after Clydevale estate in Clyde North.
Not just the size, but the positioning of the land will also impress you. It's a south facing block with a beautiful 16 metre frontage, which translates into maximum sunlight warming up your living areas and back yard! And light is life!!
The land block is located very conveniently close to good schools, colleges and the Casey Fields sporting facility, which is a major attraction for the whole of Casey! No facility too far as you are surrounded by the like of The Cranbourne Park Shopping Cantre, Casey Central Shopping Centre,
Fountain Gate Shopping Centre and many more. Doctors, pharmacies, banks,fuel stations are at the stones throw. Primary and secondary schools very close. When it comes to public transport, the block isn't far from the Cranbourne train station, Merinda Park train station or the Berwick train station.
Deposit terms: 10% of the purchase price.
Preferred Settlement: 30/60/90 days.
Name it and you have it!
It's hard to find that big a land block at that great a location. So hurry and help Hardeep Singh make it yours! Call 0406676197
Every care has been taken to verify the accuracy of the details in this advertisement, however we cannot guarantee its correctness. Prospective purchasers are requested to take such action as is necessary, to satisfy themselves of any pertinent matters.
Insights: 163 Heather Grove, Clyde North VIC 3978 was last sold in 2018.
